Entity.Description: The table stores product information.

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_ITEM table.

Attribute.Description: The unique identifier for the item.

Attribute.Description: The short description of the item.
Attribute.Name: Short_Description

Attribute.Description: The description of the item.

Attribute.Description: The extended multi-line description of the Item.
Attribute.Name: Extended_Description

Attribute.Description: The product line associated with the item.

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the kit code for this item.

Attribute.Description: The lead time for getting the product delivered. Purchase order placed today will arrive after this many days at the warehouse. Default value: 0.

Attribute.Description: Define processing time for items in days such as special services.

Attribute.Description: The cost of one unit of an item.

Attribute.Description: The manufacturer of the item.

Attribute.Description: The identifier used by a manufacturer to identify an item.

Attribute.Description: The item's country of origin/manufacture.

Attribute.Description: The harmonized code of an item.

Attribute.Description: The NMFC code for an item.

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether an item is taxable.

Attribute.Description: The velocity code.
Attribute.Name: Velocity_Code

Attribute.Description: The tax product code of an item.
Attribute.Name: Tax_Product_Code

Attribute.Description: The default product class of an item.
Attribute.Name: Default_Product_Class

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether this product item is returnable. Default value: N.
Attribute.Name: Is_Returnable

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates if credit may be provided with out receipts on return of an item.
Attribute.Name: Credit_WO_Receipt

Attribute.Description: The number of days after which return may not be accepted. Default value: 0.
Attribute.Name: Return_Window

Attribute.Description: The minimum number of days before which return may be accepted without any override. Default value: 0.
Attribute.Name: Min_Return_Window

Attribute.Description: The number of days after which the return will not be accepted. Default value: 0.
Attribute.Name: Max_Return_Window

Attribute.Description: The ECCN number of an item.
Attribute.Name: Eccn_No

Attribute.Description: The schedule B code of an item.
Attribute.Name: Schedule_B_Code

Attribute.Description: This field indicates whether an item is tag controlled. Inventory module uses this flag to determine if additional inventory attributes need to be stored for the item.

Attribute.Description: This field is currently not used.
Attribute.Name: Tag_Req_At_Receipt

Attribute.Description: This field is currently not used.
Attribute.Name: Tag_Req_At_Shipment

Attribute.Description: This flag indiactes whether the item is time-sensitive. Inventory module uses this to determine if inventory is dated. Default value: N.

Attribute.Description: The monitoring rule that will be used by the availability monitor.

Attribute.Description: The default for number of days after which an item would expire.

Attribute.Description: The organization code whose product information is being stored.

Attribute.Description: The generic type of an item.

Attribute.Description: The unit of measure for item quantity.

Attribute.Description: The master catalog to which an item belongs.
Attribute.Name: Master_Catalog_Id

Attribute.Description: The weight of one unit of item quantity.

Attribute.Name: Unit_Height

Attribute.Description: The unit of measure in which item height is measured.
Attribute.Name: Unit_Height_Uom

Attribute.Description: The length of one unit of item quantity.
Attribute.Name: Unit_Length

Attribute.Description: The unit of measure in which an item length is measured.

Attribute.Description: The width of one unit of item quantity.
Attribute.Name: Unit_Width

Attribute.Name: Unit_Width_Uom

Attribute.Description: The NAICS code of an item.
Attribute.Name: Naics_Code

Attribute.Description: The UNSPSC code of an item.
Attribute.Name: Unspsc

Attribute.Description: The hazardous material classification code of an item.
Attribute.Name: Hazmat_Class

Attribute.Description: The commodity code of an item.
Attribute.Name: Commodity_Code

Attribute.Description: The minimum order quantity.
Attribute.Name: Min_Order_Quantity

Attribute.Description: The maximum order quantity.
Attribute.Name: Max_Order_Quantity

Attribute.Description: The primary enterprise associated with an item.
Attribute.Name: Primary_Enterprise_Code

Attribute.Description: The advance notification time for this item. Communication to ship the order to shipping node/supplier is made at most this many days before the expected shipment date. Used during the release process. Default value: 0.
Attribute.Name: Advance_Notification_Time

Attribute.Description: The maximum notification time for this item. Communication to ship the order to shipping node/supplier is made at most this many shipping calendar hours before the expected shipment date. Used during the release process. Default value: 0.
Attribute.Name: Max_Notification_Time

Attribute.Description: The minimum notification time for this item. Communication to ship the order should be made at least this many days before the expected shipment date. Used to determine the earliest ship date on the line. Default value: 0.
Attribute.Name: Min_Notification_Time

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether a PS Item is standalone and does not require associations with product lines for it to be included on an order line.
Attribute.Name: Is_Standalone_Service

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether an item is FIFO tracked. Default value: N.
Attribute.Name: Is_Fifo_Tracked

Attribute.Description: Indicates if during scheduling an order, substitution is allowed or not. If Y, schedule will automatically attempt to substitute an item with preferred or regular substitute.
Attribute.Name: Is_Sub_On_Order_Allowed

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether an item is to be serial tracked in inventory.
Attribute.Name: Is_Serial_Tracked

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether an item is serialized.
Attribute.Name: Serialized_Flag

Attribute.Description: The number of secondary serial numbers applicable for a serialized item.
Attribute.Name: Num_Secondary_Serials

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the level at which the item requires Return Shipping Label. Valid values are N,S and P. N indicates that the item does not require return label, S indicates that the item requires return label at SKU level and P indicates that the item requires retun label at package level.
Attribute.Name: Return_Shipping_Label_Level

Attribute.Description: The unique global identifier used to cross reference an item with another catalog organization.
Attribute.Name: Global_Item_Id

Attribute.Description: The item group code. Used to identify if the item is a Product, Provided Service, Provided Service Option, Delivery Service or Delivery Service Option.
Attribute.Name: Item_Group_Code

Attribute.Description: IThis flag indicates whether the item must be associated to an order line having a group code of PROD. Applicable for service items which must be associated to a Product order line.
Attribute.Name: Requires_Prod_Association

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether this provided or delivery service item is to be associated only to a return document. Default value: N.
Attribute.Name: Is_Return_Service

Attribute.Description: This field determines how the pricing unit of measure is defaulted for the item. It could be same as the inventory UOM or could be different. Valid values: INV - Same as the inventory UOM; ALT - Different from the inventory UOM. Default value: INV.
Attribute.Name: Pricing_UOM_Strategy

Attribute.Description: The pricing unit of measure, if different from the inventory unit of measure.
Attribute.Name: Pricing_UOM

Attribute.Description: The capacity unit of measure.
Attribute.Name: Capacity_UOM

Attribute.Description: The service type associated to this service item.
Attribute.Name: Service_Type_Id

Attribute.Description: This field determines how the pricing quantity is arrived at when different from the inventory quantity. Valid values: IQTY - Based on the inventory quantity. Default value: IQTY.
Attribute.Name: Pricing_Quantity_Strategy

Attribute.Description: This field determines how the ordered quantity is arrived at for a service line. Valid values: ENT - Based on the entered value on the order line; PROD - Based on the associated product line. Default value: ENT.
Attribute.Name: Ordering_Quantity_Strategy

Attribute.Description: The fixed pricing quanity per line. Fixed pricing quantity will be assumed irrespective of the inventory quantity for the line shipped with this item.
Attribute.Name: Fixed_Pricing_Qty_Per_Line

Attribute.Description: The pricing quantity conversion factor. This conversion factor is multiplied with the inventory quantity of the line to arrive at this pricing quantity.
Attribute.Name: Pricing_Quantity_Conv_Factor

Attribute.Description: This field determines how the capacity quantity is arrived at for provided and delivery services from the inventory quantity. Valid values: ORD - Based on the ordered service quantity; ASSOC - Based on the service and product association. Default value: ORD.
Attribute.Name: Capacity_Quantity_Strategy

Attribute.Description: The fixed capacity quantity will be assumed irrespective of the inventory quantity for the line shipped with this item when the strategy is fixed.
Attribute.Name: Fixed_Capacity_Qty_Per_Line

Attribute.Description: The capacity per ordered quantity. Used to compute required capacity based on line ordered quantity.
Attribute.Name: Capacity_Per_Ordered_Qty

Attribute.Description: This is the minimum capacity quantity which will be assumed when the inventory quantity of the line to arrive at the capacity quantity when the strategy is to arrive at the capacity quantity by association with product line.
Attribute.Name: Minimum_Capacity_Quantity

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the delivery method SHP is allowed for item. Default value: N.
Attribute.Name: Is_Shipping_Allowed

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the delivery method DEL is allowed for item. Default value: N.
Attribute.Name: Is_Delivery_Allowed

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the delivery method PICK is allowed for item. Default value: N.
Attribute.Name: Is_Pickup_Allowed

Attribute.Description: The storage type code of an item.
Attribute.Name: Storage_Type

Attribute.Description: The picking type code of an item.
Attribute.Name: Picking_Type

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the operational configuration is complete.
Attribute.Name: Operational_Configuration_Complete

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the item can be shipped through parcel service. Default value: Y.
Attribute.Name: Is_Parcel_Shipping_Allowed

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether invoicing is done based on actual weight to support catch weight items.
Attribute.Name: Invoice_Based_On_Actuals

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether this item is a container or not.
Attribute.Name: Is_Shipping_Cntr

Attribute.Description: The type of the container.
Attribute.Name: Container_Type

Attribute.Description: The code that identifies this container.
Attribute.Name: Container_Size

Attribute.Description: The maximum volume of the container.
Attribute.Name: Capacity_Volume

Attribute.Description: The volume unit of measure of the container.
Attribute.Name: Capacity_Volume_Uom

Attribute.Description: The volume allowance that is permitted for this container.
Attribute.Name: Volume_Allowance

Attribute.Description: The maximum weight of the contents that can be placed into this container.
Attribute.Name: Max_Cntr_Weight

Attribute.Description: The maximum weight unit of measure of the container.
Attribute.Name: Max_Cntr_Weight_Uom

Attribute.Description: The weight of the empty container.
Attribute.Name: EmptyCntrWeight

Attribute.Description: The run quantity indicates the multiple of quantity in which a work order gets created. This field is valid only for service items.
Attribute.Name: Run_Quantity

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether an item performs segment change.
Attribute.Name: Involves_Segment_Change

Attribute.Description: The computed standard cost of the item. This will be set when createItem/ modifyItem API is called specifically with computeUnitCost flag as Y and item unit cost is calculated based on REPLACEMENT COST.
Attribute.Name: Computed_Unit_Cost

Attribute.Description: The primary supplier. This will have the primary supplier organization code for the item.
Attribute.Name: Primary_Supplier

Attribute.Description: The posting classification. This will have the item grouping value for the Financial Ledger groups.
Attribute.Name: Posting_Classification

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether an item is assumed to be always available. Default value: N.
Attribute.Name: Assume_Infinite_Inventory

Attribute.Description: The on-hand safety factor quantity of this item. The OnhandSafetyFactorQuantity will be excluded from the actual on-hand availability of the item if the scheduling rule, node type, and supply type are configured to apply on-hand safety factor.
Attribute.Name: Onhand_Safety_Factor_Qty

Attribute.Description: The on-hand safety factor percentage of this item. The OnhandSafetyFactorPercentage will be excluded from the actual on-hand availability of the item if the scheduling rule, node type, and supply type are configured to apply on-hand safety factor. OnhandSafetyFactorPercentage will be used only when OnhandSafetyFactorQuantity is not specified.
Attribute.Name: Onhand_Safety_Factor_Pct

Attribute.Description: The future safety factor percentage of this item. The FutureSafetyFactorPercentage will be excluded from the actual future availability of the item if the scheduling rule, node type, and supply type are configured to apply future safety factor.
Attribute.Name: Future_Safety_Factor_Pct

Attribute.Description: Indicates if item can be shipped by air. Default value: Y.
Indicates if item is hazardous material.
Indicates if item requires freezer for transportation. Default value: N.
This flag indicates if the item can be forwarded for zone skipping. Default value: Y.
This flag indicates if the item can be procured for zone skipping. Default value: Y.
Indicates if the item can be sold separately. If N, then the item must be part of a bundle or kit. Valid Values: 'Y' or 'N'.
Attribute.Name: Is_Sold_Separately

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the age verification code for the item
Attribute.Name: Age_Verification_Code

Attribute.Description: Defines the start time when the item is valid.
Attribute.Name: Effective_Start_Date

Attribute.Description: Defines the end time when the item is valid.
Attribute.Name: Effective_End_Date

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether this item is configured to be a service tool.
Attribute.Name: Can_Use_As_Service_Tool

Attribute.Description: The department the item belongs to.
Attribute.Name: Department

Attribute.Description: The class of the item.
Attribute.Name: Item_Class

Attribute.Description: The subclass of the item.
Attribute.Name: Item_Sub_Class

Attribute.Description: If the InheritAttributesFromClassification flag is passed as Y and the value of the item attribute is not defined at item level, the system will try to find the value from the classification definition for the ClassificationPurposeCode - 'Inherited Item Attributes'.
This field describes the size code of the item.
Attribute.Name: Size_Code

Attribute.Description: This field describes color code for the item.
Attribute.Name: Color_Code

Attribute.Description: This field describes the identifier of the item with variations to which this item belongs.
Attribute.Name: Model

Attribute.Description: This field describes the unit of measure of the item with variations.
Attribute.Name: Model_Item_UOM

Attribute.Description: This field specifies UPC company prefix length specified in GTIN.
Attribute.Name: UPC_Company_Prefix_Length

Attribute.Description: Indicates the number of days an item can be delayed after it becomes available to be consolidated to a single shipment. Used by scheduling when shipment/cost optimization is considered.
Attribute.Name: Shp_Consol_Window

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the item is allowed for Item Based Allocation process.
Attribute.Name: Is_IBA_Allowed

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the item is allowed to use unplanned inventory. Default value: N.
Attribute.Name: Use_Unplanned_Inv

Attribute.Description: The way in which the bundle will be fulfilled. It can be Ship Together(01), Ship Independent(00), or Deliver Together(02) for Bundle Item. Default value is Ship Together(01) for Bundle Item.
Attribute.Name: Bundle_Fulfillment_Mode

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates that the item is an item with variations (formerly known as a model item). An item with variations represents a group of items with similar set of attributes.
This flag indicates that the item can be gift wrapped.

This flag indicates that the item is a configurable item. A configurable item can either be a bundle or a physical kit. A configurable bundle item offers a number of different options from which a customer can select before buying the product. Components for a bundle are not specified in the catalog as the actual components will be determined by the user when an order is placed. A physical kit must always be pre-configured.
Attribute.Name: Is_Configurable

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates that the configurable item is pre-configured with selected options. If a bundle is pre-configured, the bundle or physical components that represent the selected option will be available in the catalog. For a pre-configured physical kit, only the physical kit will be available as the item in the catalog.
Attribute.Name: Is_Pre_Configured

Attribute.Description: The key of the configured model for a configurable item.
Attribute.Name: Configured_Model_Key

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the last synchronization timestamp.
Attribute.Name: SyncTS

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the maximum modify timestamp of this item and its related entities.
Attribute.Name: Max_ModifyTS

Attribute.Description: The field indicates the remote modify timestamp. This field gets updated when changes are apply through item synchronization.
Attribute.Name: Remote_ModifyTS

Attribute.Description: External location of the image.
Attribute.Name: Image_Location

Attribute.Description: Unique ID of the image in the external location.
Attribute.Name: Image_ID

Attribute.Description: Label of the image.
Attribute.Name: Image_Label

Attribute.Description: Determines whether the item is eligible for shipping discounts. Default Value: Y.
Attribute.Name: Is_Eligible_For_Shipping_Discount

Attribute.Description: The sub-catalog organization that maintains the item definition.
Attribute.Name: Sub_Cat_Org_Code
Bundle_Pricing_Strategy
Attribute.Description: Determines how a bundle will be priced. A bundle can by priced by PARENT (only the parent's price is used), COMP (only the components' prices are used), or ALL (both parent's and components' prices are used). Default: PARENT.

Attribute.Name: Keywords
Attribute.Description: A field used to specify keywords to be associated with the item.

Attribute.Name: Configuration_Key
Attribute.Description: A reference to the BOM XML if the item is pre-configured.

Attribute.Name: Config_Model_Name
Attribute.Description: The configuration model name for this item.

The category value for which the item attributes belong to.

The maximum notification time for this item. Communication to ship the order to shipping node/supplier is made at most this many shipping calendar hours before the expected shipment date. Used during the release process.

While retrieving availability of this item at a node with a node type that has ApplyOnhandSafetyFactor set to 'Y', the percentage specified as OnhandSafetyFactorPercentage will be subtracted from the actual on-hand availability of the item. The future safety factor percentage of this item. While retrieving availability of this item at a node with a node type that has ApplyOnhandSafetyFactor set to 'Y', the percentage specified as FutureSafetyFactorPercentage will be subtracted from the actual future availability of the item.

Entity.Description: This table stores hazardous material compliance data as published by the US Department of Transportation (DOT). This data is pertinent to code of federal regulations as formulated by the US Department of Transportation (DOT).
Entity.Name: Hazmat_Compliance

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_HAZMAT_COMPLIANCE table.
Attribute.Name: Hazmat_Compliance_Key

Attribute.Description: Indicates the symbol of hazardous material.
Attribute.Name: Symbols

Attribute.Description: Indicates the proper shipping name or description of hazardous material.
Attribute.Name: Proper_Shipping_Name

Attribute.Description: Indicates the category of a hazard assigned to a hazardous material. Its value ranges from 1 to 9.
Attribute.Name: Hazard_Class

Attribute.Description: UN numbers are four-digit numbers that identify hazardous substances and products (such as explosives and poisonous materials) of commercial importance. This is widely used in international commerce, for instance to label the contents of shipping containers.
Attribute.Name: UN_Number

Attribute.Description: Packing Groups (PG) indicate the degree of danger of a hazardous material within its hazard class or division and relate to the strength of packaging required for shipment. It can take values Packing Group I - high danger, Packing Group II - medium danger, Packing Group III - low danger.
Attribute.Name: Packing_Group

Attribute.Description: Indicates the label code.
Attribute.Name: Label

Attribute.Description: Indicates the special provisions to be provided while shipping the hazardous material.
Attribute.Name: Special_Provisions

Attribute.Description: Indicates the packing exceptions while shipping the hazardous material.
Attribute.Name: Exception

Attribute.Description: Indicates the max quantity that can be shipped while shipping non bulk.
Attribute.Name: Qty_Non_Bulk

Attribute.Description: Indicates the max quantity that can be shipped while shipping bulk.
Attribute.Name: Qty_Bulk

Attribute.Description: Indicates the max quantity that can be shipped while shipping via passenger aircraft or rail.
Attribute.Name: Passenger_Air

Attribute.Description: Indicates the max quantity that can be shipped while shipping via cargo aircraft.
Attribute.Name: Cargo_Air

Attribute.Description: Specifies where the cargo is stowed on a vessel.
Attribute.Name: Vessel

Attribute.Description: Specifies other stowage plans.
Attribute.Name: Vessel_SP

Attribute.Description: Unique number to identify a hazardous substance. The difference between the preceding and the succeeding sort order value equals to five. This is to accommodate new hazardous materials.
Attribute.Name: Sort_Order

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: User who modified the record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: Program that created the record.
